problems.title: Mars/Moon Digital Currency
problems.statement: How to build a robust digital currency system once we move to Mars or Moon? Consider: 8-22 minute communication delay with Earth, need for offline transactions, extreme reliability requirements, multi-planetary consensus, and AWS services architecture.

problems.title: Air Pollution Reduction via Flying Taxis
problems.statement: How to use AWS technology to build a movable air device like clear-air taxi to bring down air pollution? Consider: real-time air quality monitoring, route optimization for minimal emissions, fleet management at scale, predictive maintenance, and AWS IoT and analytics services.

problems.title: Personal Air Taxi Safety System
problems.statement: Self-driving cars are good, but how to build an air taxi for each individual in a safe and secure manner leveraging AWS technology? Consider: geo-fencing and no-fly zones, real-time collision avoidance, weather-based routing, zero-accident architecture, regulatory compliance tracking, and AWS services for safety-critical systems.
